summary: Fall Out Boy is an American rock band from Chicago, formed in 2001. The band members are Patrick Stump, Pete Wentz, Joe Trohman, and Andy Hurley. They started as a pop-punk project and gained popularity with their album "From Under the Cork Tree" in 2005. Songs like "Sugar, We're Goin Down" made them famous. They had more successful albums like "Infinity on High" and "American Beauty/American Psycho." The band went on hiatus but reunited and continues to make music. Their latest album, "So Much (for) Stardust," came out in 2023.
title: Fall Out Boy
